sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './about.scss' export default function About() { const data = [ { id: 1, name: "Alexis Smith", title: "CEO of Smith Properties LLC", img: "assets/woman.png", icon: "assets/linkedin.png", desc: '"Saeed went above and beyond to provide a quality redesign of our website to help with our SEO. I would recommend his services to anyone that is needing any type of assistance in the digital space."', featured: true, }, { id: 2, name: "Thomas Durden", title: "Senior Developer", img: "assets/thomas.png", icon: "assets/linkedin.png", desc: '"I absoultely loved working with Saeed. He is incredibly flexible, and is willing to put in the hours to deliver a quality product. He just gets it!"', featured: false }, { id: 3, name: "Samuel Carter", title: "CEO of Restoration Plumbing LLC", img: "assets/plumber.png", icon: "assets/linkedin.png", desc: '"Saeed assisted us by integrating a pay now button on our website. Before payments on our website seemed difficult and far fetched, but Saeed made it easy for us."' } ] return (

Testimonials

{data.map(d => (

{d.desc}

{d.name}

{d.title}

))}
) }
